text: Zai tamen zhihou, wo ceng jixu paiqian wo de zhong shizhe, wo you jixu paiqian mai er yan zhizi er sa, wo shangci ta “yin zhi lei”, wo shi ta de xintumen xinhuai ren'ai he ci min. Tamen zi chuang chujia zhi ──wo weiceng yi chujia wei tamen de dingzhi ──tamen chuangshe ci zhi, yi qiu zhenzhu de xiyue; dan tamen weiceng qieshi de zunshou ta, guwo ba baochou shangci tamen zhong de xindao zhe.
